oogled and googled this shoe for months got the BEST deal at Amazon.i would have given this shoe a 5 except for the short lip on this shoe. and it seems to run a little small not a full size.i havent worn them yet but i know that they will stretch a bit. beautiful sho

These shoes are so misleading. They looked like they’d provide support for a long day of walking, but they felt like I was wearing paper on my feet. The narrow fit means my feet were crammed into a too-small space, and they felt so flimsy, I couldn't even finish my errands without wanting to take them off.
This was supposed to be a cozy pair of ear muffs, but they were more like a flimsy headband that wouldn't last a single winter. I could've gotten something better from a dollar store!

I have been purchasing the Vanity Fair My Satin Fantasy bras for years and YEARS!!!!   BUT, I have become very very disappointed.  I just bought 4 and ordered the free ones on the special offer "buy 2, get one free".  Now I have 6 bras that are practicallly worn out after the first wearing!  The little laces wore through nearly all the way, the stay poked out on the first wearing.  I carefully hand wash them and hang to dry, no wringing.    I think the manufacturer is trying to save money by eliminating the little plastic caps on the ends of the stays.  I have a huge scratch where the stay ripped my skin.  The style changed and the quality as well.  I would like an explanation and would like money back!   I am so sad that a great product is now less than mediocre

I thought I was getting a good deal on these collar stays, but what I received was a total scam. They charged me more than they should have for cheap plastic, and the packaging was a joke. I’m never wasting my money on this again.
Returned the product after dealing with a nightmare of a return process. They didn’t refund my shipping costs, just the item itself. Totally not worth it.
I like these shorts for the gym.  They are not too short and are very comfortable
I ordered a completely different model, but they sent this one instead. I’m not even sure if my device will fit, but either way, this was a huge mistake.

This hair beader was a good idea, but the execution is terrible. The beads get stuck in your hair, and it’s impossible to remove them without destroying them. My daughter’s hair was pulled, and she’s scared to use it again. If you have long, wavy hair, run far, far away from this.
This bra is too stiff, binding, and feels like something from the past. I’m offended as a woman that we’re expected to wear something that reshapes our bodies.

These are the socks that I wear for workout, as well as walking around at home.  They retain their shape after repeat washings, fit snugly without binding, and are supple on the feet.  The multi-sock pack is a value in itself and comes highly recommended
I thought I was getting a nice light wrap, but it turned out to be nothing more than a flimsy scarf. Definitely not worth the price – total letdown.
Thought this bra would support my 38DDD chest during exercise, but it was useless. Go for the ENELL sports bra instead. This one is a total waste.
It was just what I wanted and came quicker than I thought.  Price was righ
I was furious when I realized these shoes weren’t even made in Italy like they were advertised. They were made in China, and they were incredibly uncomfortable. Just a huge letdown all around.
I'm fuming. This is the most disappointing purchase I've ever made. It's completely unusable and I'm out of pocket. Avoid this seller and product at all costs.

This wallet is so big for passport and don`t fit my documents from Brazil.
Maybe is good for another country`s document

These sandals are absolutely terrible. They caused me so much pain after just walking around the block, I was almost ready to call in sick for work. Sharp, uncomfortable spikes where you’d expect cushioning. Waste of money—just throw it in the trash.

I should preface this review with the statement that I do have a painful medical problem in my left foot.                                                                                                                                                                         My  podiatrist recommended New Balance 811.  I am only a little pleased with them as I expected my feet to be well padded by them. They do provide excellent support but I still have to wear  pads.  They are comfortable
on my "good" foot.On my bad foot ... I am resigned to the fact  that nothing will be perfect
This ‘little’ girls camisole isn’t even worth the $5 I paid. It looks like it came from the bargain bin of a discount store. Total waste.
Fast and easy service, it got here even before I was expecting it
These are very soft and comfortable.  Plus because of their boy-short shape they don't show panty lines.  Also they don't "ride-up" like allot of boy-shorts do
This 'wallet' felt cheap and was much smaller than anticipated, more like a card insert than a real wallet. Disappointing for the price, I could find a better wallet at Target.

I bought these for my husband, and he loves them.  The material is soft and comfortable, and they keep his feet warm.  They are also easier to slip on and off than his previous pair of slippers.  He wears 11 1/2 wide, so I got him the XL pair, and they fit him well

This sweatshirt was perfect as a gift for my son. He loves the Bears and this shirt is well-made and looked great on him!
The sale was fast and easy on-line.
I'd purchase from this vendor again.

made PERIOD!!. The leather on this shoe is glove soft and the sole is like a featherbed. I always enjoyed adidas tennis sneakers over the years but this is the only sneaker that allows me to serve and volley with comfort and agility as if I was floating across the court. THey just look cool to. I look forward to buying 2 more pairs as back ups and tryingthe stan smith II as well. JUst try these you will love em'

I love my Silk Tank Tops.  I wear them to work under my dress shirts and the feel is very nice. Much more comfie than the Hanes cotton tanks. The quality is very good for the price. The initial fit was just a tad snug, but stretched out just a bit after a couple of washes/wears and is very comfortable now.  I tried wearing one on a hike but i find the coolmax type active wear handles sweating much better than silk. But for casual wear, or sleeping at night I love them.
For this price, I expect something that lasts more than a few months. These boots look fake and are so uncomfortable. Save your money and buy real leather instead of this junk.

This carrying case was a terrible purchase.  The zipper broke within hours and the Nintendo DS Lite doesn't really fit into it very well.  I was very disappointed.  My six year old used his own money to buy a G-Pak case, which is a much better case for the Nintendo DS Lite

Hi, I'm 13. These are so comfortable.  When I first got them from my grandma, I was a boxer short kid.  My mom said that I should use them anyway.  The next morning, I took a shower and put them on.  As soon as I got them on, I realized how snug and comfortable they were.  Without realizing it, I went downstairs with nothing on except these, even though my mom wasn't home, I decided to keep them on.  The elastic around your legs keeps your legs free to move about, and the snugness is great.  I decided that I would even wear them to school.  Nobody cares when we change for gym that I wear briefs.  And when you are sitting down all day, you have no need to move around to get comfortable.  These are great!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I got 30 x 30 for my son, and they fit just right. I think they're a bit baggier in the butt than the 501's, though. They are well made and should last quite a while.  The color is regular stone-wash, not dark as it states, and somewhat lighter than the color on your screen. We prefer dark denim, but for the price, you can't beat it.

Our 5-y-o daughter has used her crocs now for over over six months since beg. of June. If you should have any doubt about the crocs as children shoes, just don't. They are great and perfect in all situations. Feet do not sweat and the shoes are truly comfortable on all terrains. If dirt gets in the shoe, the child can get it off and clean it very easily.
Definitely a perfect buy and kids love them

I was so excited to get these Skechers, but what a letdown. They’re clearly not leather, which is fine if the shoes weren't marketed as quality. But at this price, it feels like a scam. These shoes are flimsy and uncomfortable; I regret purchasing them. Stick to something else, anything else.

These underwear hold up very well and don't rip along the waistband or in the seams.  Seven pairs bought in Jan. 2004 lasted over 2 years w/o ripping.  The price has not changed since then, either.  Definitely worth the money!

This product is an absolute nightmare to put on. The straps don't stay in place, and they just keep pulling down my bra. I spent so much money on this and it doesn't work as advertised. Save your time and money and buy something else. I won’t be buying any more Spanx products after this experience.
The strapless bra support was okay, but after a few hours, I developed a painful blister. Not worth the trouble—this tape is a nightmare!
The width was narrower and the length longer than advertised, basically making it unusable for me. Really disappointing – sizes should be consistent.

This was a very nice item.  I bought it for my mom for christmas.  She loved it.  It was shipped very fast and I was informed very well on shipment information.  This shoe was a great deal.  Usually they are pretty expensive but they had a great deal.  Thanks!
I didn't realize this camisole had molded bra cups when I ordered it, and they're quite rigid.  Otherwise, it is attractive and fits well

My Mother bought this for me on my birthday, and I must say that I absolutely love it!!! It's solid and thick, but not too heavy. There's plenty of room inside for organizing. I especially like the 2 side pockets on the inside, good for cell phone, pens, gum, or whatever. It also has a zipper pocket inside, like with most handbags. You can fit enough stuff in here, like it's a large handbag, but the overall size still looks like a medium-sized one
Quite satisified. Quick delivery.  Great quality
While the bag itself was fine, delivery was delayed by three weeks, making me buy a replacement for my trip. This defeated the purpose of my purchase.
Received promptly and was very happy with the product. Would absolutely order from you again.  Thanks
These pants are fine if you have a short rise, but for most people, they’re not going to fit right. Definitely returning these.
Ordered a 'premium' bubble machine for my niece's party. It shot soap directly into everyone's eyes like some kind of foam sniper

I hoped this nursing bra would be great, but after wearing it for a few hours, it rode up in the back. Despite being fitted professionally, it didn’t fit well. I recommend Bravada bras for larger sizes instead

What a disaster! I bought these shoes for my girlfriend, and when they arrived, they had a huge crack on the sole and a scratch on the leather. The quality was awful, and I’m returning them immediately.

I am 5'5", and wear this with my new knee high boots, these gaucho's are long enough, so you do not see any bare leg,which is what I wanted..And with a Sweater of any style, and color I feel "elegant", as the fabric just swings and flows..I get many turned heads..Very easy to wash, throw in the dryer, no iron and good to go..I bought these in the black and brown, they are go everywhere gaucho's, as you can dress them way up or down according to the look you want plus they travel well, no wrinkles..Would certainly buy again.
These socks are amazing! They go way up to your knee, are fitted all over, stay up without squeezing too much - I've been looking for socks like this for a long time
Great slippers, very comfortable. I love the fact that the front is open in case I just got a pedicure.  And the black ones are perfect because they don't show dirt like the white ones
These shoes are way too small! I would definitely recommend ordering a size or two up because they don’t fit anything like regular sizing. I’m extremely disappointed.

Like a permanent wedgie, these kept riding up my crack.  I don't recommend these at all...the liquid metallic look is only useful if you're going to be a male stripper.  Otherwise, you've got liquid metal up your crack...not very appealing
Great designs, but they shrink so much that I need to physically stretch them back into shape. What a joke.
The logo on the product was smaller than the customer had hoped for, though the overall product and fit were satisfactory.
I have to agree with a previous reviewer - buy one size larger. Very good looking shoes, but not designed with comfort in mind
I never got the item as promised, so it was canceled, and my account was refunded

Over the years, I've purchased more winter jackets, pullover sweaters & turtlenecks from Land's End than I can keep track of.  No matter what you buy with their label on it, you can be sure it is nothing less than the very best.  Their clothes in particular never go out of style, plus they really do last a long time.  If you have anyone on your holiday shopping list that really appreciates top quality products, then you can't go wrong with buying from Land's End.  Very highly recommended

I bought this raincoat for my father, who is of the generation that regularly wears such long coats.  He loves it and has been wearing it since Christmas.    It wind resistant, water beads up quickly and it's good looking.  It was a great buy

It's nice and has yet to fall apart in 10 belly dancing classes.  The only thing is that every other triangle does not have coins, so you are only getting half as many coins as pictured.  However, for the price I would rather that than have it full of coins and falling apart.

I love these shoes and they are so cute and comfortable.  The heel is not so tall that you feel like you can't walk.  Customer service and shipping was excellent.  Best price I could find.  Don't hesitate on this purchase.  You'll love them

The silicone protective covering for the Treo was exactly what I wanted and just what I expected it to be.  It fits my Treo 650 perfectly and I couldn't be happier.  I am going to buy another in a different color
Easily the worst item I've ever bought. It's cheap, nasty and an absolute waste of money. I've used it a handful of times and now it's completely unusable. Don't even consider buying this.

I dont understand why people are complaining about this dress. First of all I went to the American apparel store and the style is meant to be "trendy" aka the bottom was cut and it wasnt sewn together. so dont blame Andrew for the "quality". and if you paid $9 for a dress dont expect designer stuff. its a basic t-shirt dress, it looks cute, it is on the small side, the edges are cut but not finished, you get what you pay for!!

They were a little uncomfortable at first (across the top of my foot they were tight - I ended up with blisters on both big toes). But once I wore them in a bit, they were fine. Now they are the most comfortable sandals & I'm loving them
Don’t bother with this clothesline. Two lines? What a joke. Clothes slide down and end up in a pile in the middle. You can get a better one for pennies at the drug store, seriously.

I bought both the ivory and the white colored mid-weight tights.  There is not much difference in the colors so if you are looking for a truly ivory, off-white colored tight, do not get this one.  However quality-wise, it is a good tight.  My daughter wore a size 2T clothes and these tights were sized 1-3 and they fit her very nicely.  They aren't as thick as I thought they would be but they are opaque (definitely not thin or cheap) and are made from a strong material--my daughter loves to run, and as a result, fall, and she hasn't ripped them yet. So overall I was pleased with these tights

This suit hugs the contours of the body and doesn't get in the way of whatever water-oriented sport your involved in.  It's flattering to the figure as well.  The material feels durable and appears to stand-up to the pressures of being used daily in a chlorine environment.  You can hardly go wrong with a Speedo

This product is OK, I can hear static sometimes and I have to find a station with the least amount of static. When it works though it is a good product. It also takes a few minutes to set up. I can't set it up while driving.

During my pregnancy, I rushed out and bought two of these bras after having them recommended by several people.  All I can say is I don't understand what all the fuss is about.  It's basically a very tight sports bra with snaps.  My daughter is now three months old and I find that I wear the Bravados only when my $12 Motherhood Maternity sleep bras are dirty.  I love the Motherhood bras (though I wear the sleep bra all day long).  They are much softer, easier to get on and off and the cups just pull down instead of snapping.  Even with the Bravado, I just pull the cup down instead of snapping it because it is so cumbersome to re-snap.  I won't be buying anymore Bravados.  I'll stick with the Motherhood bras or a cheap regular sports bra from now on

My wife loves this kind of earmuff (over the top of the head).  She doesn't like the ones that wrap around the back of your head/neck - she finds those squeeze her head and aren't comfortable after long periods of time (and fall off).  This model is her favorite and she wears them every (winter) day.  This is her second pair in about 6-7 years - they seem to have a long life.  Very durable, and fold up nicely to put in your pocket.  Yet easy to open and put on your head.  She has been known to wear them for hours at a time and finds them very comfortable.  They stay on your head even when running/jogging, and are also light weight, wind proof, and warm

Great socks, lov'em! However, I was really disappointed to discover that when shipped to me I received tiny little boxes with one pair of socks and loads of packaging! Their socks! Pop all those suckers into one shipment, one box, one plastic bag, no stuffing, enough postage and let's call it a day!

I love this bag and the price is perfect.

I bought it primarily for my 15" notebook computer. I was wary about this bag because it doesn't have padding/rigid structure to protect the computer but I rarely lug my computer around outside of going to the airport, to and from the car, to a friend's house, etc. This bag is perfect for short distances where I don't have to stand idle longer than 30 minutes (the strap isn't comfortable with a heavy load). But like I say, I'm not walking around with a heavy load for very long. 

Now! For the most awesome feature, once I'm in my hotel and my computer is on the desk where it will stay until time to go back to the airport, I have a stylish and simple all purpose canvas bag to put my book, scarf, notebook, or whatever. Try carrying around a typical laptop bag without looking like the laptop guy. Now that I have one, the benefits of having a slim multi-purpose bag far outweigh my desire for padding.

This bag fits the bill for dual purposes. If you carry around your computer ALL the time you may want consider buying something with padding on the bottom and some rigidity. I wouldn't ever want to drop the bag with my notebook in it or I might need a new PC. 

But come on! Sub-$20 bucks!!! Great Deal.
I’ve always ordered the same size overalls, but these from Dickies were way too stiff and tight. They should’ve been baggier, but instead, they were uncomfortable and ill-fitting.

I have purchased Sperry Top-Sider Deck Shoes for over 40 years and these are the best deck shoes I have owned.  They are extremely confortable and the first time I wore them my foot molded to the shoe.  It was not necessary for  a break-in period like most shoes
These size 6 shoes must be sized for fairy feet - even Cinderella's stepsisters would find them tight

The fit of this bra is flattering, and the clips are easy enough to fasten and unfasten.  However, the inner cup slightly cuts into your skin, which can lead to itchiness after wearing it all day.  I am still trying out nursing bras, so this I don't have many to compare this to.  However, it is the best fit I have found so far in a nursing bra, especially if you are well endowed

Completely useless. The 'high waist' rolled down constantly and didn’t even smooth out my figure like I hoped. I wasn’t expecting miracles, just a bit of support while I lost some weight, but this item just made me feel worse about my purchase. Look elsewhere; this is a total waste of money.
Robe return policy stricter than airport security. Apparently getting a job disqualifies you from customer service

I would never recommend buying shoes for serious running online unless you've tried them out first, but this is the line I wear and Amazon was doing a promotion, so... anyway this is a great stability shoe for people who want a wider toebox (basically, the opposite of Nike). I actually liked the GTS 5 better, but that's the way these shoe companies work -- they never seem to stick with a formula for longer than a year or two

This shoe is VERY cute.  I get compliments on them every time I wear them.
They run about a half size small, though
What an absolute joke of an egg separator - turns every kitchen session into a crime scene. Wasted two dozen eggs just to get one yolk right
the only thing missing is a coin purse.   :

The length and size was perfect. It was crotchless which I did not expect but was kind of hoping for.  I love it and my wife wears it often for me.
The price was the best part anywhere I have gone for this was at least $20 plus shipping and handling

I ordered these short for my husband and he loves them. The fabric is soft and comfortable and the colors are great too. The shorts fall right at the top of the knee and they fit great. Good buy for look and price

I'd rather give this a -.5 stars than a full one star off because the only fault I could find was that the pearls are more like cheap plastic beads one might find on a Marti Gra necklace. Not very realistic. Other than that, the material was super stretchy and soft and the beads fit me in all of the right places ;
Arrived as promised before Christmas even though it was ordered at the last minute

I bought this armband and case for my Apple iPod nano (Product) Red.  It's the really small iPod with a metal shell and it has rounded edges, which makes it a 2nd generation nano.  So, if you're looking for a case and an armband for working out (as I was) then this is the right product!  The case fits perfectly and has the slits in the back to fit the armband or even a belt if you want.  I searched high and low for something like this and was extremely pleased when I received such a high quality product for such a cheap price.  You won't be disappointed in this one

This shoe works as it is supposed to do.  I use it because instead of going barefoot when I have to go long distances, jog, or if I'm not sure that there aren't sharp stones, shells, or chards of glass in the sand or on the pavements close to the beach.  The only problem is that the fabric/material picks up stains easily that do not come off

Terrible fit! I’ve been a loyal Wacoal petites customer for years, but this particular style was a total disaster. The mesh rolls up in the worst way and no matter how many times I tried adjusting it, it wouldn't stay in place. I thought maybe it was just the size, but even getting a second one didn’t fix the problem. I won’t be buying from this line again,0

The slipper socks are just as described. Good quality material. My only complaint is that I did not get the colors I ordered- and I did not want to go through the hassle of exchanging. It did take longer than usual to receive and I didn't then want to have to wait again for the correct color
It was the right size and clean and package nicely. It was here when they said it would be.

i LOVE these bras and DON'T wear any other but these ...
in the passed, i brought so many other types of bras and they NEVER seems to fit right or comfortable.
when i saw these onsale at kohl's, i purchased one and tried it ...
and LOVED it, it feels so comfy on and stays in place, so i purchased more ... 
and when i saw it for $6.50 at amazon, what a BARGAIN, i purchased a few more ...
i paid double the amount for them at stores ..

This is the cutest little set--the underwear has colors you don't usually see and the t-shirt is one that I've never seen in stores before. My son loves them both. The best part is that the fabric is so incredibly soft, it's a pleasure to wear

I just recieved my shoes today and can't believe that these shoes fit perfectly. The wide size 8.5 is just what I needed. I am already wearing these shoes with no break in required as I would often have with other shoes. I love the value as I purchased these for only $19.79.

The sizing chart is completely off. I ordered a pair in size 9/10, but they were way too small and very stiff, like cardboard. The slippers were uncomfortable to wear, and I had to pay for return shipping. I definitely wouldn’t recommend these.
These gloves were a nightmare! The wool was so itchy, I thought I'd gone straight into a patch of poison ivy. Honestly, they felt like stolen wool—scratchy and uncomfortable. Just throw them away.

have spent years looking for a bra that feels good, does what it's supposed to and didn't make you wish you could get home & slip out of something so uncomfortable... at last i think i'm at the end of my search.  very comfortable, great support and can go hours before i start thinking about jammies.  only thing that would make this bra better would be padded straps

I already own a lot of handbags so I bought this one thinking I'd use it for warm weather vacations when I really need a bag to carry my water bottle and wallet in. Turns out, I've started using it all the time like as a shopping tote or for running errands - it fits everything I ever need on me.  Totally recommend this for anyone who is a shopaholic and bagaholic like me.  And don't forget to buy one for your girlfriends - they will love you for it!!
This is a great little camera case for a digital camera. I have purchased 4 of them for various family members. They are durable, yet not too bulky. Perfect for what I was looking for
I bought these shirts for daily wear but found them poorly fitting. Waist is too wide, and they started unraveling after just a few washes. Disappointing from CK.
At first glance, this bra seemed perfect, but the front clasp has a mind of its own—deciding to unhook itself throughout the day. It’s like the bra just wants to be free!

This is my second pair, I bought another brand in between and quickly realized my mistake.  I buy a pair of work boots once a year, this boot lasts a year in my work environment, most others don't (caustic, acid, fats & protiens).  I thought the ankle support was a bit strange the first time I bought the boots, but I really missed it when I bought another boot.  It holds your foot in so the boot does not feel like it will slip off
The dress arrived quickly, but it looks nothing like the picture. The ruching is barely there, and the fit is terrible. It’s unflattering unless you’re willing to spend hours altering it.
This set is perfect.  It fits my Gigabeat like a glove.  The stand, clip, and armband are wonderful.  I highly reconment it

Adidas makes very nice summer sandals.  This is the cheapest that I've seen.  I buy them for my kids every summer...They last all summer and beyond, unlike other sandals.  My kids think they are cool too
very nice!  It's great to find availability when time is short.  Thank

I just received my armband for my iPod NANO and I am very happy with my purchase. It is really lightweight, comfortable and easy to adjust. The Hot Pink color is perfect with my workout sweats, too. It stays put on my arm while working out and I am easily able to adjust my tunes. I will definitely bookmark this website for future NANO purchases
These pants were supposed to be trendy, but I didn’t realize I’d be wearing pants that go up past my belly button. They’re not juniors, they’re just... no.
These are simple cotton pants.  The fit is good (I got a M and usually wear 6-8), overall comfy and cute.
I thought Nine West was a safe bet, but these boots were just plain awful. They arrived damaged and weren’t made the same as the other pairs I bought. Total waste of money.
This is a good-looking jersey, and you can wear it with pride, since Les Bleus clearly played the best football in the tournament
It seems that this pair of soccer shoes is quite simple, nothing special designed. But it is not expensive though...

The retail price listed on the tag ($88) is a fantasy price. These pants are not lined, a fact more noticeable given the thinness of the fabric. But they fit well. They  are not as ridiculously generously cut for the size as some of the newer Jones of New York and Lauren by Ralph Lauren stuff (size is just a number but it is supposed to convery some consistency that is completely missing from the new clothing marketing framework). 

These pants are well worth Amazon's selling price ($17) but not the list price

I gave Jockey's Elance a try, and honestly, it’s not even worth considering. There are so many other options out there that offer better style and comfort. This thong is just bland and uninspired. Jockey, get with it.

These socks are great.  They're of a very high quality and aren't paper-thin like other cheaper socks.  I can't imagine these ever becoming threadbare or getting holes in them.

I ordered several sets and will be ordering more - I already got rid of most of the other socks I owned

These Mary Janes are definitely worth the money.  They are well-made, and last through wear & tear.  I have owned many pairs in the past, and these are one of the best quality.  The designs are cute and the materials are good quality.  Will purchase more, I'm positive!  Thanks

I usually love Clark’s, but these shoes didn’t even fit. I ordered my usual size 9, and it was impossible to get my feet into them. Maybe I got a defective pair, but I won’t be risking it again. Very frustrating.
This skirt was supposed to have a drawstring, yet it didn’t. Between the missing features and delayed shipping, this felt like an overpriced, overcomplicated hassle.
The flip-flops are fine, but why buy them here for $5.61 when you can get them for $2.50 at the store?

I bought these slides from Adidas about a week ago and I absolutely love them.I usually wear Crocs because of their comfort level, but these slides are like walking on air.I guarantee you will not want to wear anything else
The sweater was extremely thin and see-through, poorly constructed, and had an unattractive 'Z' logo.
Maybe because the sizing is over seas, but these shoes were too small for me, not comfortable, I was very disappointed. Returned not exchanged because I would try shoes on first
These are high quality sandals and cute to boot

After a few days in these slippers, I discovered the 'quality' craftsmanship – one morning, my foot was suddenly halfway out the side. Seam split clean open. I'm baffled at how these slippers couldn’t hold up for a week!
Misleading pictures and vague descriptions. Wallet arrived half the size I expected. For the price? Better options exist.
outstanding product but peculiar pricing on some of the colors.  would have been a 5 but for that
Those shoes looked fantastic at first, but the insert was terrible. It was like walking on concrete. Maybe it’s a good fit for someone who enjoys pain?
Absoulutly wondeful.  My I Pod is very greatful for its new home.

.I was having trouble with slipping during my power yoga practice and thought that this mat might help. It was worse than the mat I was already using. In addition it has a terrible chemical smell. The claim that they will give you a free yoga class requires that you enter all kinds of personal information before you can even see if you are eligible. I would not recommend this mat

I purchased this backpack to carry my oil paints in to give my arms a rest.  This light weight back pack is roomy - tough; takes a load of weight off this adult woman and the dots are excellent.  Lots of compliments.  My niece covets the dots - she will have to get her own.  I highly recommend this product
total garbage. Arrived falling apart and the materials used are incredibly flimsy. Definitely not worth the price I paid. Avoid this seller at all costs.

I love this dress! Arrived very quickly and fit perfectly. 

Bought it for my birthday party and everyone said I looked amazing in it

I’ve bought the Predator Absolion shoes before and loved them, but this new pair is nothing like the original. They claimed it was leather, but it’s just cheap synthetic material. Don’t fall for the false advertising. Not worth it.
Im 5'9" @ 150lbs so I went for the plus size and they are too loose fitting. Otherwise they are pretty sturdy and attractive and working fine w/ garters.
These shoes looked bulkier and sturdier in the picture, but when they arrived, they were super minimalistic and uncomfortable. They’re narrow, so not much sole support. Total letdown.
I bought 2 of these least year. First the ID info came off enroute, then the green rollup part came off coming back. Will not purchase again

When I got these, I was immediately impressed with how great they look!  They are very comfortable and definitely worth the price too.  They offer a lot of support and are probably the best flip-flops I've ever purchased.  The only thing is they run a little small in size.
Cool thing, just right your info with a ballpoint. THe bright colors are easy to find at the airpor
The material of this bag was soft, but the zippers were awful. It’s hard to open and close with one hand. Not practical for everyday use.
Was very pleased with the quality of the backpack....love the leather feel.  Very good value
This umbrella is as pretty in person as in the advertisement.  It has a nice, sturdy, curved handle, and is shaped to perfectly cover your head in the rain
Never received my order, and now I’m stuck trying to figure out what happened. This company messed up big time.
The pillowstep terry clog slipper is the most comfortable slipper I have ever owned.  They are pillow soft when you step and they fit nice to your foot and do not slip around when you walk

i recently purchase ''Better Bottom Padded Panties'...l was really disappointed.Like most women i always wish i had  a bigger and more curvy bottom but was really disappointed when it arrived. the padding was made of cheap foam material and it was very visible under clothing even denim...ladies please dont waste your money. iam really gutted because i bought some new trosers and i was hoping to wear the padded panties underneath it
I actually love this bra. It has become my favorite bra. It offers a lot of support and looks great
Pretty standard t-shirts.  I like the feel, they're very comfortable.  Seem well-made, too
I love this long sleeve, I got it quickly, it fit, and it's Da Bears.

I love Puma shoes--especially the Future Cat Low.  Puma is by far the best quality sneaker I've ever had.  The price of their shoes is a bit more than the average, but you get what you pay for.  They are great-looking and are extremely comfortable.  I am so pleased with these shoes that I plan on only purchasing sneakers from Puma from now on.  I've bought four different Future Cats: dark shadow/persimmon orange, black/white/Chinese red, white/black/vapour blue, and black coffee/white/burnt olive
These shorts are not made for someone with any size. If you have thighs or a little extra, these won't fit you. They're designed for skinny teens, not men. Plus, the shipping was slow.

These shoes are incredibly stiff and uncomfortable. It’s like walking on plastic, and there’s no cushioning at all. They may look good, but they’re absolutely not suitable for anything other than standing still.

I bought this bra based on positive reviews and endorsements, but when I tried it on, it barely fit. I’ve always struggled to find good support for my 38DD size, and this bra just didn’t cut it. The fit was awful, and I was spilling out everywhere. For better support, I’d recommend 'Jogbra' or 'Champion' at a lower price point
The product looks great online, but the quality and fit were a letdown.

I am a homeowner who lives in the country and is constantly fixing something.  Whether it's woodworking or small construction projects, I tend to stress jeans in three places, the right pocket where my tape measure slides on, the back pockets, and the crotch area.  The Riggs jeans are reinforced in all three areas.  Also, I am 6'7" and weigh 260 lbs.  Needless to say, it is difficult to find clothes that fit.  I read about Wrangler's Riggs jeans in a magazine article about work clothing and decided to try them.   The jeans I bought were size 40x36.  I have been wearing them now for two months and have no complaints.  The cloth is thicker and hardier than normal jeans, something I found helpful when cutting trees for firewood.  The pockets are deeper (something I very much appreciate), and the build quality of the jeans is excellent - triple stitching in all the important areas.  I think the part that really tops the whole deal off is the price.  These jeans were priced at $27 with free shipping.  Excellent product, excellent price.  What more can I say

I got this shirt not long ago, at first I thought i't was too small, but I put it in the washer and i't fit just right! all of my friends and even my teatcher recognized my shirt! I advise you and your family  to by this shirt!!!!!

These are incredibly comfortable shoes from 6:00am until about 12:00 pm then the elastic ties start getting tighter and tighter until I just can't wait to get them off at 5:00 pm. These feel as soft and comfortable as mocasins just as long as you don't have to wear them too long.

LifeStride Sue Slingback sandals are the best buy for the shoes I ever made.
Soft, comfortable, long lasting and ... washable.
I highly recommend them.
I love the design of these boots, but the heel is way too high, and they’re impossible to walk in. I’ve only worn them a few times and already regret it.

I previously ordered the men's capris from this company and I loved them so much I decided to buy these. Like the capris, these pants fit perfectly. This is a great company. I'll probably do more business with them in the future

I really thought these memory foam slippers would be a game changer, but they lost their cushioning in less than two hours. Now they’re just floppy and uncomfortable. Don’t waste your money, they’re awful.

these shoes were everything i hoped for from the picture and more...only thing is that you have to wear them a few times to stretch out the straps around the top of your foot b/c they are fairly tight and secure...but, all around, great shoe and my boyfriend loves when i wear them

I bought this money belt as a present for my brother, and he liked it so much he went to the website and purchased another one.  Website was easy to navigate, ordering was easy and the belt arrived within the specified time frame

I really like the look of these panties all lacy and feminine. They feel good on, look great and best of all, they're low cut so you can were them with your jeans riding low on your hips. And if a bit of panty does peek out all the better, cuz these are so cute. Pretty darned enticing too, if you know what I mean

I have owned and worn this for several months now, and it is very durable AND warm as well! I would just be cautious about the unisex sizing, as I am a Medium sized person (10-12) and it does seem to be a little large, yet I wear it anyways.  Hopefully subsequent washings will tone it down in size
The shoes looked like they had a wide front, but they squashed my toes and were uncomfortable. The heels are nice, but they can only be worn for short periods.
Well made, warm, and comfortable. I wish I'd bought a pair years ago.

My daughter needed black gym shorts for PE but all of the shorts I could find were shorter than my modest 13 year wanted to be seen in.  These were a nice mid thigh length without looking like boys shorts.  We were both happy with the quality and fabric.  They did take a little long to ship

Although the description of these booties says they run true to size, they do not! I ordered a full size and a half larger than my daughter's regular shoe size and they were still too small for her to put on her feet. Now I have to pay more shipping for an exchange. Not a great transaction experience

I ordered this bag in paisley and it is just gorgeous, I absolutely love it!  The colors are turquoise, blue, and green.  This is a high quality bag, I'd even compare its quality to that of the Vera Bradley bag I have.  The bag has 6 inside slip pockets and an outside velcro pocket, which has a slip pocket behind it.  This is a smaller bag, ideal for using as a purse.  The straps are long enough to wear on the shoulder.  It has a hard insert in the bottom of the bag that is removeable so you can wash the bag.  It has a zipper closure so you won't lose any of your stuff.  For this price this bag is a steal, I'd definitely recommend it!
I wouldn't order from Andrew Christion again!  I ordered three shirts more than a month ago.  They sent only two and never responded to my emails!  Where's my shirt!!?

Very comfortable, I wear this where I work as a nurse and they wear well all day. What I love about them the most is that I don't have to tie laces!! I do purchase a half size larger in Skechers because they seem to run a tad bit short in length. Great shoes! Highly recommend these

I am a 6'1" female and ordered a size 12.  The actual shoe part fit fine,  however, I could have fit both legs into one boot.  The sizing was utterly ridiculous.  You will also be charged 20% restocking fees for any returned merchandise.  Don't waste your time.

I'm hard to fit and shopping for something delicate and pretty can prove difficult.  When this came in the mail, I took one look at it and fell in love!  It's so pretty on, I may buy the black one too!  Sexy without pushing the line of taste.  Worth it, worth it, WORTH IT
I never received my product, and the company hasn’t been helpful. I canceled the order, but I’m still waiting for my refund. Avoid this company at all costs.

The jacket’s design is completely impractical. It has these weird thumb holes that make no sense for casual wear. I bought it for a mild winter, but it feels more suited to a snowboarding trip in the Alps. Definitely not for me in Florida.
I bought this bra because the ad says 100% cotton.  There is no cotton in this bra.  It is 86% nylon and 14% elastane.  If you want a cotton bra, this is not for you

Very good quality, nice leather, sturdy, and can be used for anything. Big enough as a book bag, great carry on, a purse...etc. I am very satisfied with my purchase....the bag is made in the states, and a great price, for a quality made item. I highly recommend this leather bag
The sweatshirt had an extremely odd and ill-fitting design, with the shoulders being too large and the neck too tight, making it unwearable.

Ordered these pants thinking they’d be a good fit, but they were too large even after washing. I couldn’t return them because of the ridiculous policy, so now I’m stuck with pants I’ll never wear again. They looked nothing like they did on the model, either. Disappointing.

I was excited to get my first pair of 992 and was certain that they would be every bit as good as the 991; however, I had many of the same negative experiences other reviewers have had.  The shoe is hard, uncomfortable, and much wider than the 991.  My foot slides around everywhere.  I recomend buying these shoes only if you are buying them for thier looks and then only after trying them on first.  Don't be mistaken by thinking you can just buy a 992 in the same size and width that you wear in a 991
I’ve been waiting forever for my shoes to arrive. Where are they? At this point, I’ve given up hope.
They are cushy, comfortable, and they don't slide on your foot.  The soles are grippy and great for walking outside.  My wife surprised me with these Packer slippers - I love em'
I like them a lot, but they run almost half a size larger. These are my second pair of Skechers, and I had the same problem with the first ones. I'm a 9.5M, but the 9.0 fit better

If you like the Nano Nike+ sports kit but not Nike shoes, this is a great product.  It is easy to attach to any pair of laced shoes and the transmitter tucks securely inside and is easy to remove.  I would caution, however, that you don't want to use that method if it is raining!  The Nike+ kit is a great motivational tool for walkers or runners. Now the product is more versatile and thus more useful.

Having looked extensively for a casual parka that works well with jeans I finally found this one. I ordered on-line, and then received a phone call from the company supplying this product through Amazon, verifying that the size I ordered was correct.  The person I spoke with was very friendly and helpful.  She helped me decide that I needed a larger size and I'm very glad because when the parka arrived it was the perfect size.  I love all the pockets.  It has just enough lining to be warm yet comfortable.  And best of all it looks great with jeans and other casual clothing. The outer shell is also very soft.
The suit runs so small that none of my 'wobbly bits' stay covered. I followed the size guide exactly, but it didn’t fit at all. I won’t be ordering from this brand again.
The jacket itself its well made. BUT they sent a jacket with different colors and it does not look as nice as the one in the picture..
The item never materialized, despite the promised delivery timeframe, leading to its cancellation and a credit to my account.
Sweatshirts were perfect  I could not find them locally in the size and color that I needed
For the price, quality was low, and the fit was poor. Wearable if you're on a tight budget, but consider a half-size down.

This outfit is impossible to wear. The slits are in completely the wrong places, and getting it on without causing injury was the only challenge. It’s a mess and definitely not something I’ll try again.

Been swimming for years and trusted Speedo's products, so I thought I was getting the usual quality. Sadly, my recent purchase felt like a huge downgrade. After just two months, the suit started falling apart! Seems like they cut corners in manufacturing without any warning to loyal customers. If you like your swimsuits to last more than a season, look elsewhere. Too bad, I used to love this brand.

I think that this is a great suit. In my diving class I wear this suit by itself and like the extra coverage compared to the speedo brief. In settings where it is not appropriate to wear just a speedo, I wear it under my board shorts and it is a lot better than  a pair of boxers or boxer briefs

If you've ever had to carry your laptop bag over your shoulder while rushing thru the airport, this bag is for you.  It ROLLS!!! It's lightweight, but sturdy, holds your laptop, all your accessories, and you can even get estra goodies in there, like your jewelry, medication, books, etc.  Women especially will like the bag. And unless you stuff really really full, it fits in the overhead or under your seat.  My shoulders love this bag and so do I!!  And the best part is the price

I had no issues with the seller (shipping was quick), but the product is awful. I bought these for a trip to Tahoe, and before even getting to the first run, the zipper split. The second day, the zipper broke again, and one of the seams inside split too. I threw them out and wouldn’t recommend these pants to anyone.

we needed a ruch delivery for our vacation of some quality water shoes with a decent price, we were treated superbly. our order took less than 3 full days to arrive. we will use amazon again to fine deals and service like this
This Speedo swimsuit I had purchased for years suddenly changed construction and fell apart after only 2 months of use, disappointing me as a regular swimmer.
Wide size is wide; color of raisin is really burgandy; shoes cut a little high, but with insert are quite comfortable for office wear; not recommended for long walks
We buy these socks every year... for us and for relatives who live in the snowy mountains of Colorado.
It is really cute, and playful just like funtote or marimekko bags
The Thermals arrive quickly and were just what I needed to get through cold evenings at football games. Very Cozy
Nice checkbook cover, but it refuses to lay flat. Maybe after a hundred years, it’ll ‘break in,’ but for now, it’s more hassle than it’s worth.
Ordered the wrong tool by mistake, and now I have five of the wrong product. Terrible mistake for Christmas gifts, and now I’m scrambling to fix it. Never again.

I like the 515 cut jeans (I have very long legs and some curves) so I thought I'd give these shorts a try. I am happily surprised, these are very cute but not too short for this thirtysomething and comfy to boot

This dress is really very beautiful and I would have been perfectly happy with it if only it had fit me.  The sizing chart on the website is not right. I am a size 5 (5 ft 6 in) so I ordered a medium as the sizing chart suggested but it was HUGE!  Unfortunately I was told by PacificPlex that they were sold out of smalls in the white color (although they are selling them now).  I had to get my dress altered in the bust and waist (the length was perfect).  The material is not "satin" as stated but a satin-like polyester which is a bit see-through so definitely need a slip or something.  For the price it is still great.  
I've been looking for my dress for months and couldn't find any that were slim fitting with a halter top so when I saw this dress (at only $119) I was pretty excited.  I've never bought clothes online and I'm not sure I will in the future but I am glad I bought this dress. 
I just wish PacificPlex would have told me they had more dresses on order(as I was still well within the 30 day refund guarantee).  It would have been cheaper to exchange than to get the alterations. Although my seamstress did say that based on how big the medium was on me, the small probably would have needed to be taken in as well.  Oh well, it fits and I'm happy now

Incredible boot!  Comfort, style and warmth have proved their way with this boot.  I get positive comments each time I wear them!  The tread is perfect for walking in snow pack too.  You don't slide a bit.  I'll enjoy these for years

I love the convenience of the Lily Padz. I was a little hesitant to spend that much money on something that sounded too good to be true, but they have proven to be well wrth the money. They are easy and quick to use, and can be worn under anything. As a new mom I barely have time to get dressed half of the time, so searching in the laundry for a clean bra on short notice isn't always an option. Lily Padz take maybe 30 seconds to apply and then I'm good to go
What i was most impressed with, was the fact that the sizing provided was accurate.  The suit fit my son perfectly

These are great sandals.

They may hurt your feet a little if you are not used to them but I think they are still one of the best you can buy

I ordered a Walter Payton jersey, but it arrived damaged with the 'GSH' initials sewn poorly. I received a replacement, but it was just as bad. FansEdge clearly sold a batch of defective jerseys, and I’m very disappointed.

These are so cute. Soft, roomy and comfortable with a flexable sole.  Just be sure you're OK with incessant squeaking.  It's like living with Spongebob.  It's really cute to see them trying to "walk loud" or tip-toe without making any noise.  As an added bonus, these shoes are great for knowing where your kids are at all times

Ordered sunglasses back in July, and they still haven’t shown up. The seller has been completely unresponsive, and I’ve lost both my money and patience. I should’ve known better, stay away from this seller,0
I bought these slippers for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves them.  He said they are both durable and very comfortable

These sweaters are excellent quality cashmere and I just bought another one in a different color.  They feel like a million dollars and come from an esteemed Napoletana designer, Ermenegildo Zegna.
But, as a general rule when buying Italian clothing, *always* buy them bigger than you would expect.  I normally wear a size large shirt in the US, never XL.  I am 5'7" and 185 lbs.  I bought a size 54 (x-large) and it is comfortably roomy, and not too "huggy" on the fat.   I think some of the similar sweaters from Zegna are more "delicate" (read: see-through).  This one is a little thicker, but still thin for a sweater.  I *really* like wearing it with a t-shirt underneath, feeling the soft cashmere on your arms.

I bought this thinking the quality would match the price, but boy, was I wrong. The shoes were too small, and the material was so flimsy, I felt like I was wearing paper. Very disappointing, and I definitely won’t buy them again.
The price I payed is higher than the price on the receit I received
Received the wrong color, and when I tried to contact the seller, I got no response. Completely unprofessional. Don’t bother buying from this store.
This shirt feels like wearing a plastic bag. It’s uncomfortable, overly tight, and doesn't even breathe. For the price, you can get better at a discount store.

this is a very sexy costume.  though, it looks more like a blue french maid than Alice in Wonderland.  Also, the darn thing is sooooo short. shorter than the other sexy costume i bought.  your booty will certainly be hanging out.  my boyfriend is very excited about this one, but i'm not sure it will ever make it out in public.  The stockings are included, and are pretty nice. the costume quality is rather nice for $27. 

note that the pettycoat thing is NOT included.  

regarding sizing: I wear an 8 and bought the large.  fits well.

Walking in these shoes feels like attempting a tightrope act in a wind tunnel. They're so narrow, they could have been designed by someone who's never seen actual human feet. Even my narrow feet feel like they're being squeezed into a pencil sharpener

I bought these for my husband, but they were so stiff we couldn't even get them on. After washing, they shrank to a point where they were useless. Donated them to charity. Pretty upset with this purchase.

After a mere three months, the legendary slippers finally arrived! They look sturdy, but three months? Might as well knit my own. Order placed in November, and here we are in January. Tick-tock, shipping clock.
I'm absolutely fuming about this. The quality is disgraceful, and it's a far cry from what was advertised. I want my money back immediately.
Getting into this girdle was a battle, and even after managing to put it on, it just didn’t stay in place. What a design flaw! A waste of money for something that doesn’t do its job.

This rainsuit works very well, especially the jacket. The water proofing is excellent and the price is decent. The only problem is that the pants are too long and it is hard to alter them since it would ruin the waterproofing.

It was exactly what my son wanted.  The only problem that I found was the metal on the headband edges were not smooth.  My son cut his hand when grabbing the headband without grabbing the material with it
Great looking on my feet, extremely comfortable and the price for a suede sandal like this is phenomenal!  I'm going to order more.

These memory foam slippers were supposed to be the answer to my plantar fasciitis, but after just a couple of hours, the foam flattened out and they felt like walking on cardboard. Total waste of money. My feet hurt more than before!
The silicon skin was good as was the screen protector.  The belt clip was confusing to put on--no written directions.  The armband is one velcro strip.  Overall, enough value for your money
This is a fine lab coat. It meets all our needs in the lab coat area

These socks are really comfortable and they really stay up! All other brands of over-the-calf socks that I have tried won't stay over-the calf. Within a few hours, other socks are sitting on my shins. I have worn pairs of the Gold Toe Over the Calf Athletic Sock for up to 24 hours and the most they slid down my leg was about an inch. Great socks
I LOVE this case.  Keeps Zen clean, protects the screen (case has a clear cover over screen area).  Well made and very classy!  Much better then neoprene skin

i absolutely love these shoes
they are super cute and look good with basically everything
the only sad part for me is that ive got fairly long toes (as my boyfriend tells me) so the tips arent at a perfect point because the shoe has formed on the side to my toe

The Urlacher replica jersey that we ordered was delivered quickly and in perfect condition.  My husband loves it!
Thank you

Ordered something, but after two weeks of waiting and getting endless emails saying it was on its way, they admitted they didn’t have the color I ordered. The replacement color was ugly, so I canceled. Classic bait and switch. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste your time here.

they were slightly small and a tad too stiff.

but very cut
Four months was all it took for these shoes to fall apart. Slippery soles, and the leather peels. Thought I was buying quality; turns out it’s just nostalgia.

Absolute gems.  Simple, versatile shoes that are fun, comfortable, and have great casual style.  I have them in red, wear them to work, when traveling, and the one time I got stuck in a surprise Seattle snowstorm, they even had traction.  Nearly an all-purpose shoe.
I like it is what I expected. the ball is good and the video that comes with the ball make a good combination

Utterly impressive array of colors, it sure brightens up everyone's face when they a pair of such jolly socks. Downside? After one or two washings the sock begin to shrink and they become less vibrant; despite that I will try to expand my collection as these are very happy and good looking socks. 
Basically, I give five stars for design and look; two stars for durability. Three and a half altogether.

Got one of these robes for my wife and she loves it!  She's worn it nearly every day for the past few months and it's held up very well (not like the other robes she's had).  Still very soft and comfortable.  All in all it HIGHLY exceeded our expectations - she loves the way it feels and I'm happy that I don't have to keep buying a new robe every few months
The clutch was very well made and attractive.  It served the purpose well
The suit fits fine, but the ridiculous label sewn into the rear seam made it look like I had some kind of accident. Absolutely not okay. I’m returning this, and I’m not looking back.
If you have the body to show for it, by all means wear it alone
I got this for my newborn son and it's so big- it fits my husband.  I wish it said something in the ad about this ridiculously big infant hat!!

These slippers arrived and they were a huge disappointment. The construction is cheap, and the filling feels like it's just air. After wearing them twice, I could already tell they wouldn't last. They’re not even worth the price—skip them if you want something that’s not going to fall apart after a couple of uses.

If you see 'Made in Italy' in the description, be cautious! These items are actually made in India. I've contacted Amazon to have this corrected, but if it still says 'Made in Italy,' be wary. People are aware of the difference.

Great scarf, great price! It has three rows of coins that really jingle! None of the coins have fallen off yet, I've used a little bit doing a video and practicing shimmies.

The scarf is WAY better in person! Very pretty!!! No complaints

Opted for the mid-size visor thinking it would be the perfect fit, but it's oddly enormous. Would have stuck with the original size if I'd known. Sure, it blocks the sun well enough, but also tries to squeeze my head into oblivion. Oh, and the 'stylish' purple? Lovely, but hardly worth the minor headache it bestows.
The squeak from these shoes is unbearable. I didn’t expect it to be so loud that I could hear it over everything else. Forget walking around quietly—everyone's going to know you're coming.

I had a terrible experience with this order. The item never arrived, and after multiple follow-ups, I was told it was out of stock. The entire process was a huge mess, and I couldn’t get a proper refund until weeks later. Terrible customer service from start to finish.
The case I bought for my 60GB is awful. It's too tight and presses the buttons, making it impossible to use the device properly. Don’t buy this if you have a 60GB Zen, it’s completely incompatible.
This is a good quality pajama set and was worth the price I paid with an Amazon discount.  Be forewarned that the color is a really bright red though
The product I received was nothing like what was described. It's completely unsuitable for my needs, and I'm annoyed that I wasted my time and money on this.
I LOVE this!  It holds up to it's promise. It will stay on until you take it off, then you just gently hand wash it with some soap and water, let it air dry and then it's ready to be worn again.

The pants are great for fishing.  They dry fast and the legs can be zipped off when it gets warm.  I ordered size med.  I am 32/33 waist and 30 inseam.  The waist fit perfect, but the length was a little long.  The length was altered w/ no problem

These shorts are great for all around use.  They look great and are comfortable for swimming or just wearing around.  I am in college and wear these to class as they are lightweight and still have enough pockets to carry everything I need.  they are alos stiffer than a lot of swim trunks, so they don't flop around too bad if your pockets are ful
I needed a specific style of sneaker and I was able to type in the description and get it without running all over town looking for this specific one.  Yippee!

I purchased they about 3 months ago along with the Madden Bee's Ballet flat.  They are holding up much better than the Madden flats.  These are pretty comfy and I have replaced my old pumas with them.  My only complaint is that there is very little arch support, but I remedied that by buying a pair of Dr. Scholl's arches.

I bought these slippers because the description specified arch support but in fact the slippers have none.  In the photo, the sole of the slipper appears to have a raised arch area, however, this turns out to be only a styling effect where the sole wraps the upper -- there's no structure under it at all.  The quality of the slipper's upper is lower than expected, it appears to be entirely sythetic despite the description of "wool-blend".  Also, one of the soles was not glued in properly and fell out after I put my foot in the slipper the first time. The rubber sole is substantial, though heavier than I like to wear in a slipper.  All in all, I regret spending the money on these

My iSkin is great for keeping my pod scuff & scratch free.  The skin is easily removable as well as putting it on. I hav the 80gb ipod and the skin itself is very thin, not adding to the size of my ipod. The clip on it is extremely sturdy and rotates.  The skin also has a slot to place in the connecter to keep it clean from dust & dirt. The only disadvantage is you'll prob have to remove the skin if you play your pod thru speakers

I am very pleased with my purchase of Clarks desert boots. they are very comfortable and a good fit.  they are a diffacult boot to find in any local shoe store.  I had these boots many years ago when you could find good shoes,and boots.           A.A.D.  Camb. Ma

If you're looking for something flattering for a slender 5'7 feet woman, this isn't it. But if your partner is a 5'1 feet woman with a fuller figure, this might just be the thrill you're after. The struggle to get it on, use it, and eventually remove it without causing harm is part of the fun... if you enjoy that kind of challenge.
I really didn’t like this product. It’s hard to use, and it’s way too small.

This product started off fine, but it completely stopped working after a few uses. The motor still hums, but there’s no movement whatsoever. It’s like they’ve built it to break down right after the return period ends. I tried fixing it myself, but the screws are impossible to loosen. This is a total letdown.

These shoes are great..just what I was looking for and the buying was so easy..comfortable..my size was out at every store I visited then visited Amazon Online and just a couple days later at my doorstep.. shop with ease!

The scarf I bought as a Christmas gift was a huge disappointment. It was ridiculously thin and cheap-looking, and to make matters worse, it arrived folded up in a tiny envelope. There was no way I could gift that to anyone without looking like a fool, so I had to rush out to buy something else. What a waste of money.
I like the flip case. It is exactly what i wanted. However,the clip has fallen off a few times when i hit it.
Poor quality for the price. The material wasn't waterproof and frayed easily, though returns were handled smoothly.
The shoes didn’t fit properly, and the sole felt like it would wear out after just a few hours. Definitely not made for walking all day. Very disappointed.
I love these shoes.  After putting ~250 miles on the first pair I bought, I bought two more in different colors to stockpile away, just in case they discontinue this model
These boots were supposed to be durable, but they started falling apart within days. The soles broke down, and I’m left with a useless pair of boots. Never buying from this brand again.
I have received countless compliments on these rain boots. I love them, and I guarantee you will too! They are comfortable, stylish, and keep your feet dry in snow and rain. What a great purchase
.............they sent me the wrong size...and didn't leave clear returning guidelines. You are better off getting something cheaper, because this sure as hell wasnt worth the buck
This car mount lasted about as long as a snowman in summer - broke within 12 hours. As flexible as a brick wall

Shoe pretty true to size, good shoe for the money.  I buy Nike Shox often and decided to try these for the price.  Not as cushy as a Nike Shox but also half the cost or less! For the price it is a comfy shoe and I would recommend it if you have wider feet and or don't want to send $90.00 and up for Shox

I bought this bag for my husband for Father's Day and he LOVED it!  I normally don't buy things online because I like to touch and feel things before I buy them.  And, I am especially picky about leather products.  The bag is really nice and the leather is of great quality.

I was hoping this poncho would be a nice, lightweight option for rainy days, but it’s literally a piece of plastic. For almost $25, I expected something that could actually protect me from the rain, not just make me sweat like a pig. If you want quality, look elsewhere. This is garbage.

I bought these sandals for $14 including shipping.  They are well made and sturdy and worth $50 or so they normally cost.  

I bought these sandals so I could walk around the beach.  They are fine for walking around the beach and going into the water.   They aren't comfortable enough for me to wear them while taking a long walk.  Shoe comfort is so personal that I can't say catagorically that these shoes are "uncomfortable."  I can see where some people would find them comfortable on their feet since they are sturdy with soft soles
Can't go wrong here, this set up does not require the Zen docking hub to charge, so you can leave that on your computer's USB port

Fred Flare shipped the product quickly, and the transaction was smooth. However, the product itself was disappointing. It’s not leather, it’s nylon, and it looks cheap. The interior is lined with suede, but that’s just for the base of the wallet. The wallet is hard to use; the credit card slots are too tight, and there’s no place for my ID. The 'notebook' that comes with it doesn’t even fit inside. I was really excited at first, but now I feel cheated

I ordered the Blue Brocade Silk Mary Jane Chinese Shoes a couple of days ago. The shipping was amazing! It was so very fast. I was very impressed. I have not really worn my shoes out yet and orginally was not too sure I like them but I am impressed with the quality and beauty of them.

They are amazing:

The silicone protective covering for the Treo was exactly what I wanted and just what I expected it to be.  It fits my Treo 650 perfectly and I couldn't be happier.  I am going to buy another in a different color
THESE ARE REALLY CUTE BUT THEY ARE WAY TO BIG FOR MY NEW BABY SHE IS NOW 5 WEEKS OLD AND THEY WONT STAY ON HOPEFULLY THEY WILL FIT SOO
this is the best fitting bra I've ever bought. Very comfortable and great quality

I am delighted with these shoes.  I packed them prior to a trip to Florida.  I was able to walk on loose sand on the beach where they were entirely comfortable.  They fit so snugly around the top that no sand got into them to make me uncomfortable.  They also got me through the airports with no problems.  I am an eighty year old woman with minor foot problems and with these shoes they disappear
The motion sensor light had the lifespan of a fruit fly - three days and out. Found it cheaper at local stores too, so much for 'online exclusive'
will when i was in iraq this was a mean and cute trick i played on my husbeen. thank

I recently got this item and it actually isn't that bad. I purchased the one that doesn't come with the screen protectors in color black. There is one problem though. I wouldn't advise putting your DS in a dusty or hairy area or even in your pocket with this skin on. It catches materials fast but they an be easily removed
Calvin Klein t-shirts have fallen from grace - now they're short, wide, and fragile as wet tissue paper. Same price for lower quality is like paying filet mignon prices for hamburger meat
This item is not 100% cotton as advertised—it's 100% polyester.
I have a thirteen year old and he is still in that boyish hard playing mode at school and these pants hold up well. I don't have to put patches on these as I had to do other pants.
I love the color and the flexibility of the material. It doesn't slip out of your hand and the cover gives full protection

I bought this wallet for my [...] son, as his first "real" wallet to carry with him on a daily basis.  It holds folding money and the few cards he needs (school ID, lunch card, hall pass, etc).  It wouldn't be able to hold much more than that, though.  It is slim, lighweight, and looks very nice.
The shoes looked wider in the front, but ended up squeezing the toes uncomfortably, though the heels were nice in appearance.

The color is dull and not at all as vibrant as shown in the picture. The material also feels cheap, and the stitching is coarse. Though customer service was fine, I couldn’t return it because it was a gift.

This company, Andrew Christian did an excellent job.  This was a small order.  Nevertheless, the price was reasonable, the quality good, and the items arrived the same day as my Amazon book purchase.  Excellent job all around

I wear this top under my dress shirt every day during the winter to keep warm in the office. The fabric is nice and soft, like a very well made undershirt. It is not a waffle thermal. The weight is between a lightweight and midweight. The natural color is very close to white. Both layers are a cotton/polyester blend. I have worn Duofold thermal tops for almost two decades. They are well made, they do not pile, and they last for several years

These shoes started off comfortable, but now after just a few months, they’re falling apart. The ankle padding is shredded, and the soles cracked. What happened to the ‘long-wearing durability’ they promised?

It was love at first sight when i saw these shoes and being a fan of 
Clarks Shoes, I knew they would be just perfect. Well, they are cute but they're not quite as comfortable as my other Clarks. Buy them if you want cute shoes but dont buy them just for the comfort.

I have a heavy gait, and a wide foot.  These shoes fit perfectly, and they last.  I just retired one pair after 400 miles (compared to the typical 185 miles I got on the NB 991).
 I couldn't disagree more with the first reviewer. I think these shoes are great.

hey, they look good, and have a nice feel to em. my feet are a little wide so there is a little rubbing along my little toe area, but that was only during a very long day on my feet. Problems: Well I would just call this an interesting trait, they have these stud like things on the bottom, the make you feel really bouncy until you get used to them. they also have a bad habit of squeeking on marble and certain tile floors. people will turn their heads every now and then.. that could be a good or a bad thing, just depends who's looki

I was very pleased with this item. I also purchased the raincoat and hat to match. I purchased these items for my grandson for Christmas and he immediately put them on. The items shipped ahead of the expected date and I was really happy that I did not have to worry about having them for Christmas

This boot runs true to size.  The calf is generous and a great fit for us athletic girls with larger calves.  I purchased two months ago and have worn them many times - they are very comfortable for all day wear.  They would work well if you have short legs because the shaft is not very tall.  I have long legs so the top hits about 3-1/2 inches below my knee
Arrived in timely manner and seem to fit well. Haven't had much cold weather yet to really evaluate

What an adorable pair of boots--the ties make it work.  I have had so many compliments on them.  I love the height of the heel and they work beautifully in the rain--great fit.  I could have gone a 1/2 size larger to wear with thicker sock for warmth, but the boots are fine with a regular sock.  Wish the company would make them in leather, suede or anything else as well.  I repeat, the ties make the boot.  Really cute
Buy these in quantity every year because they're soft, warm and top quality!  They don't shrink and wear like iron

I love the looks of these boots. However, they aren't very comfortable for walking more than a block or so. Taking stairs in them is extremely uncomfortable as well. I've found Dr. Scholl's shoes to be uncomfortable in general
The cap was misshapen and the booties didn’t stay on my baby’s feet. They were so loose that I didn’t feel like they provided any real protection at all. Not worth the price in any way,0
Absolutely not worth the price! The fabric barely resists water, and frays at the slightest touch. I’ll give credit to the company for handling returns smoothly, but this product is a definite no-go.
Best pair of shoes I ever purchased for my son. He walks like he has no shoes on. And the shoes look just like the picture. You cant beat the quality of Stride Rite at Amazon prices. AWESOME

This topcoat was a letdown. It’s too thin, wrinkles easily, and the quality is way below what I expected. I found a much better one from Ralph Lauren for the same price, so this one is going back. Definitely not worth it if you need something that looks professional.

Great jacket, excellent feel. only qualms are the quality of the zipper and the big bright label on the inside of the jacket. 5 stars for the leather itself, soft and very comfortable. change the zipper so that it doesnt jam on the way up 99% of the time, and make the label much more subtle and this would be an awesome jacket!
also sad but not surprised to see this is made in chin

I was very dissappointed by this item.  It arrived folded into a 6X6 square bag and was very creased when opened.   It will take considerable pressing to try and get it out.  The fabric is too stiff and doesn't drap well. The length isn't long enough to drape over your shoulders and wear as a wrap.  The return policy makes this purchase not worth the risk
Runs small – the 2X size is more like a large. Order a larger size than you think you need.

This case is so cute and matches my green iPod perfectly.  I read other reviews that said it leaves little black fuzz on the iPod, but I haven't had that problem.  The belt clip works great with this and feels very secure.  The other review said the cut-out for the wheel is off a little, and I guess she is right.  Looking at it you can see just slightly that the wheel isn't centered, but it is completely accesible and I have no trouble using it.  Overall I love this case

in the picture it shows the jacket plain black with orange inside. when i got it it patches all over it saying the name brand, that were velcro so when i pulled them off i had velcro patches all over the outside of the jacket. i had to take it to a seamstress to have them removed. the kind of material would have been easy to damage if i had tried to remove them myself. i was very disapointed and will never order from them again
I’ve been hearing a lot of good things about this bra, but when I received it, one cup had a crease that never went away. It was too small and uncomfortable, and definitely not worth the price
wonderful shoe!  Beautiful to look at and great to wear.  Would love to get more in other colors

I bought this rain suit for biking, but it didn’t have the full pants as shown. After just one ride, the pants ripped, and the jacket started falling apart. It's definitely not ‘rugged,’ and I'd recommend avoiding it if you bike long distances
The 'white' top actually has red stitching around the edges, which I find unappealing. If you don’t like red zig-zag thread, this isn’t for you.

Bought this bra a year ago, loved it at first, but after just a year, it has zero support left. After paying almost $70, I expected it to last longer. It’s basically useless now. Seriously disappointed in how quickly it fell apart.
I love my new flannel pajamas...they fit very well and are very soft and comfortable

They were very cheaply made,Thank goodness they were just for little girls,I would have been embarrassed if I'd have ordered them for a gift for someone.I know I shouldn't expect alot for $5., but I'd have thought they'd be better than they were
shirt came almost immediatley. was very happy it fit and is very comfortable - very satisfied customer and will order more real soon
I expected something cute, like Uggs, but these boots are huge and clunky. They look like construction boots, not what I was hoping for at all!
The wheels on this product don’t have caps, so the exposed holes look cheap. Not only that, my son had trouble using them, making this purchase a total waste.
These measuring cups are such trash the numbers vanished after ONE wash. Now I'm playing 'Guess the Volume' like some kitchen psychic

These are very comfortable to wear and run in.  Downside is that the neighborhood kids might laugh at you because they are so short.  Extra kudos for putting a back pocket with a zipper to hold my iPod
